# Evolved Crystal Conductivity
## Overview
Your crystalline structures have evolved: You are no longer overloaded by lightning and instead convert it into lightning fast bursts of speed.

## Requirements and Restrictions
**Prerequisite**: *[[Colliatur]], 8th level*

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- You lose the conductivity racial trait.
- As a reaction to taking lightning damage, you may move up to your speed.
- You may use the Acid Conversion ability an additional 3 times before requiring a rest to recharge.
